name: Vicious Mockery
description:
A student project created by our team as our thesis to teach touch typing through games and was awarded as the BEST IN CAPSTONE2!

----------------------------------------------------------

Tis’ a period of kingdoms and knights.  Thou art a bard, tasked to killeth monsters f'r the king! You are a bard, hired by the king of the kingdom to shoo the monsters away. Type the letters/words that are displayed on the screen, and SMOTHER these monsters with the power of words!
